timeline.bodyText: Was this code elsewhere and it was then moved here? Or is it duplicated? I remember seeing some similar code a few days ago I think.
timeline.author: kinow

replies.bodyText:
Duplicated; there is some other methods copied as well.
The tiny difference is that the exceptions are RiotParseException ... except I missed this method!  Changed.
